name: Plank - The Jump Master
description:
This Superhero wants to traverse miles and prove his heroic skills. No doubt, he is a jump master
Can you help him to cross miles in this endless and fun adventure?

How to play:
• Aim perfectly
• Tap and hold to jump longer
• Land safely on this pillar planks

Score higher in one go in endless mode and the challenge is waiting for you.

Make sure you don’t fall in between the gaps
